channel.title: Abouts on Statistical Issues
channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on Statistical Issues

item.title: Welcome to Statistical Issues!
item.description: This a documentation web about statistical theory, modelling and implementation. We try to cover brief theory about models being used as well as implementations on some programming languages like R and Python. Authors Erick Chacon Erick Chacon is a PhD student in Statistics and Epidemiology in the Faculty of Health and Medicine at Lancaster University, where he works in the research group CHICAS (Combining Health, Information, Computation and Statistics).
